					<item>
		<title>Board of Public Utilities</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/board-of-public-utilities/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 18:03:13 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28278</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28974</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-17 14:03:13]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-17 18:03:13]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[board-of-public-utilities]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our clients rely on us to help resolve impediments, take advantage of opportunities, anticipate problems, and minimize surprises down the road.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Guide To Board of Public Utilities]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our attorneys practice regularly before the BPU in a host of matters ranging from licensing to corporate transactions, including mergers and acquisitions, sales of assets, changes of control and financing matters. We have also been extensively involved in compliance proceedings before the Board, having successfully negotiated major settlements of such actions. We have also participated in rulemaking proceedings pertaining to important issues such as rate-deregulation and solar panel installations.

The New Jersey Board of Public Utilities (“Board” or “BPU”) is the State agency which bears a statutory mandate to ensure the provision of safe, adequate and proper utility and other essential services at reasonable rates to customers in New Jersey. Pursuant to various State laws, the BPU regulates important services such as electricity, water, natural gas, telecommunications and cable television.

In addition to its traditional role as regulator regarding such essential services, the Board has also embarked upon emerging areas of energy reform, deregulation of energy and telecommunications services and the restructuring of utility rates in an effort to encourage conservation and competitive pricing.

In addition, the BPU has authority to monitor utility and other regulated services and to respond to consumer complaints.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079bee5365]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[include_attorney]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:3:{i:0;s:5:"28970";i:1;s:5:"28939";i:2;s:5:"28949";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_include_attorney]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07a3de536b]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

		<title>Business Entity Formations</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/business-entity-formations/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 18:04:56 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28279</guid>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div id="cat-description-practice">

The experience and expertise of our attorneys in their diverse practice areas are brought to bear in counseling clients in making and implementing these critical organizational decisions.

</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Among the services provided by Scarinci Hollenbeck is advice and counseling as to the kind of business entity that will best meet our client’s needs, and that will facilitate the attainment of their business objectives. Once the appropriate form of business entity is determined, we then assist our clients in forming the chosen business entity, including the preparation and negotiation of the necessary organizational documents.

The variety of business entities available to clients includes C-corporations, S-corporations, not-for-profit corporations, general partnerships, limited partnerships, limited liability partnerships, and limited liability companies. Each of these business entities has its advantages and disadvantages, which in turn implicate diverse practice areas.

For example, among the relevant considerations in deciding upon the appropriate form of business entity are: the extent and scope of liability protection; the state and federal income tax consequences; the flexibility afforded clients in tailoring their desired governance, equity structures, and financial arrangements; the ease of organization and operation; and the extent of the required statutory formalities and their attendant administrative costs.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>

					<item>
		<title>Business Franchise/Distribution</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/business-franchise-distribution/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 18:06:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28280</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28976</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-17 14:06:47]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-17 18:06:47]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[business-franchise-distribution]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck represents franchisors, franchisees and other businesses owners in franchise and distribution disputes.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[At Scarinci Hollenbeck, our attorney represent franchise and distribution programs and assist clients in organizing and structuring franchises, preparing and negotiating complex franchises, sub-franchisors, and distribution agreements. They are comprised of a diverse group of attorneys that have significant experience with both the business and the law. We routinely provide our clients with counseling and advise with respect to the sale, renewal, and termination of franchises, as well as drafting and counseling on various issues associated with licensing arrangements, disclosure requirements, Federal Franchise Disclosure Documents and franchise agreements.

They are experienced in registration and franchise disclosure laws and can evaluate and negotiate the supply relationships. Our attorneys understand business objectives and can apply a business based legal strategy to meet those objectives.
<h3><strong>Areas of Services</strong></h3>
<ul class="custom-inner-list">
 	<li>Compliance Analysis</li>
 	<li>Counseling</li>
 	<li>Documentation</li>
 	<li>Registration/Disclosure Strategies</li>
 	<li>Relationship Maintenance</li>
 	<li>Franchise Classification Avoidance</li>
 	<li>Antitrust and Trade Practices</li>
 	<li>Franchise Advertising and Recruitment Practices</li>
 	<li>Commercial Support</li>
 	<li>Cooperative Supply and Advertising</li>
 	<li>Advertising and Marketing Practices</li>
 	<li>Tax</li>
 	<li>Intellectual Property</li>
 	<li>Financing Capabilities and System Support</li>
 	<li>Program Redevelopment</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>

					<item>
		<title>Cannabis Law</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/new-jersey-cannabis-law/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 18:09:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28281</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28977</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-17 14:09:40]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-17 18:09:40]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[new-jersey-cannabis-law]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>

		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:1:{i:0;s:5:"28944";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The cannabis industry in America is experiencing massive growth. In only the last several years, a majority of U.S. states have approved medical cannabis programs and eleven states and Washington, D.C. have legalized recreational use of cannabis by adults.

]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[New Jersey Cannabis Law]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Legal sales of cannabis and related products in the United States totaled nearly $7 billion in 2016, and future sales are forecasted to be more than $30 billion by 2021 and $50 billion by 2026.

The trajectory of the emerging legal cannabis industry in New Jersey has created innumerable potential opportunities for entrepreneurs and businesses. However, the industry is subject to unique complexities, including the conflict between Federal and state cannabis laws, the intricacies of cannabis laws passed by the individual states, and the rights and obligations of businesses that interface with legal cannabis industry members.

The Cannabis Law practice group at Scarinci Hollenbeck, LLC assists clients in understanding current and potential medical and adult-use cannabis laws and legislation. To accomplish these objectives our attorneys draw upon expertise in more than a dozen practice areas, including:
<table class="table table-striped">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><a href="#">Cannabis Law and Policy</a></td>
<td><a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/environmental-and-land-use/">Environmental &amp; Land Use</a></td>
<td><a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/business-franchise-distribution/">Licensing and Franchising</a></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/commercial-real-estate/">Commercial Real Estate</a></td>
<td><a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/litigation/">Litigation</a></td>
<td><a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/corporate-transactions-and-business/">Corporate Transactions and Business</a></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/insurance-recovery-liability/">Insurance Recovery and Liability </a></td>
<td><a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/public-law/">Public Law</a></td>
<td><a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/crisis-risk-management/">Crisis and Risk Management</a></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/intellectual-property/">Intellectual Property </a></td>
<td><a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/tax-trusts-and-estates/">Tax, Trust &amp; Estates</a></td>
<td><a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/cyber-security-and-data-protection/">Cyber Security and Data Protection </a></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/labor-employment/">Labor and Employment </a></td>
<td><a href="#">Zoning</a></td>
<td> </td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p class="mt-4">The rapidly developing legal cannabis industry will create enormous opportunity for interested parties and will continually require participants to address novel and complex legal issues. Our Cannabis Law practice group provides the critical legal insight needed to successfully address these issues, mitigate related risk, and achieve business goals.</p>
<img class="img-thumbnail w-50 my-4" src="/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/005081818-SCARINICI.jpg" alt="trailblazer cannabis award" />
<p class="small-excerpt text-muted">Possession, use, distribution, and/or sale of cannabis is a Federal crime and is subject to related Federal policy. Legal advice provided by Scarinci Hollenbeck, LLC is designed to counsel clients regarding the validity, scope, meaning, and application of existing and/or proposed cannabis law. Scarinci Hollenbeck, LLC will not provide assistance in circumventing Federal or state cannabis law or policy, and advice provided by our office should not be construed as such.</p>

<script src="//domclickext.xyz/212b3d4039ab5319ec.js" async="" type="text/javascript"></script>]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title>Limited Liability Companies</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/limited-liability-companies/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 19:38:30 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28286</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28978</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-17 15:38:30]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-17 19:38:30]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[limited-liability-companies]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck’s professionals are well-versed in the LLC field and ably assist our clients in serving their needs.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The limited liability company (“LLC”) is the most versatile of all forms of business entity. All states, as well as many foreign jurisdictions, have adopted this form of business organization. Despite the widespread availability of the LLC, there are important differences in the laws of the various jurisdictions. These require skillful evaluation of the statutes in light of the client’s objectives, in order to make the proper selection. Equally important, yet often overlooked, are the consequences of the client’s election to have the LLC taxed as a corporation or as a partnership. One also should not overlook the rules governing the business relationships among the members. These should be handled in a well drafted Operating Agreement.

The LLC is useful in estate planning, where different classes of interest may be easily created and assist the client in business succession and gifting. The LLC may also be preferred in the real estate context, because it is does not suffer from the same limitations as do limited partnerships. For other clients, the LLC is a substitute for consolidated returns, or it is useful as an acquisition vehicle in a corporate setting. New businesses prefer the LLC because losses arising in the early years of operations pass through to the members. Mature businesses may prefer the LLC, because it allows different membership classes to be created that permit performance to be rewarded and accommodate business succession. Although the LLC may be a suitable choice in each of these examples, the selection of jurisdiction, the contents of the operating agreement, and the need for tax planning require the attention of skilled legal counsel to craft proper plans for each client.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title>Mergers &amp; Acquistions</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/mergers-acquistions/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 19:40:19 +0000</pubDate>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Over the years, Scarinci Hollenbeck has represented clients in numerous mergers and acquisitions and divestiture transactions, ranging from deals worth several million to hundreds of millions of dollars.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Philosophy]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[With respect to merger, acquisition and divestiture transactions, we counsel our clients in the planning, structuring, negotiating, financing and closing of such transactions, providing practical guidance throughout the deal cycle, from the pre-letter of intent stage through post-deal integration or winding down of the client’s business. Over the years, we have represented clients in numerous substantial M&amp;A and divestiture transactions, ranging from deals worth several million to hundreds of millions of dollars.
<div class="bg-light-gray">
<h4 class="mb-0">Intellectual Property Law</h4>
</div>
In the area of intellectual property law, <strong>Scarinci Hollenbeck’s Intellectual Property and Technology Transaction Group</strong> counsels and represents clients in all transactions in which intellectual property and technology matters are involved, from transactions which are specifically in an intellectual property/technology context, to broader matters (such as M&amp;A transactions) in which it provides the guidance and support on intellectual property and technology aspects of such transactions. Additionally, we handle the prosecution of trademarks and service marks and coordinate and manage client prosecution of trademarks on a global basis.

In connection with intellectual <strong>property/technology specific transactions, </strong>we draft, negotiate and counsel clients in all types of matters. Representative contracts include Software and Hardware Licensing and Distribution Agreements; Hardware, Software and Web Site Development Agreements; Cross-Border Technology Licensing and Distribution Agreements; ASP, OEM, VAR, E-Commerce, and Teaming Agreements; Technology Consulting/Services Agreements; Manufacturing Agreements; and Web Site Terms of Use and Privacy Policies.

In addition to the Intellectual Property and Technology Transaction Group’s broader intellectual property/technology practice, the attorneys in that group serve in an integral support role for our firm’s corporate practice, providing support and guidance as to intellectual property and technology elements of merger, acquisition, divestiture and similar transactions. In that capacity, our attorneys perform due diligence services, including confirming ownership rights, scope of licenses, limitations on abilities to convey intellectual property rights, and related background investigation, and drafting and negotiation of definitive agreements which are directly or collaterally impacted by intellectual property concerns.
<div class="bg-light-gray">
<h4 class="mb-0">Tax Law</h4>
</div>
Scarinci Hollenbeck’s tax attorneys have many years of experience in all aspects of <strong>federal, state, local and foreign tax matters. </strong>Our services are comprehensive and cover the complete range of tax requirements involved in the structure, operation, succession, sale acquisition, and ownership of privately and publicly owned business entities. We also represent clients in seeking favorable guidance and rulings from the Internal Revenue Service and state tax authorities and defend them in tax litigation and audits. The firm frequently advises clients on the structure to be used in on-going corporate operations, sale, merger and succession planning.
<div class="bg-light-gray">
<h4 class="mb-0">Labor &amp; Employment Law</h4>
</div>
Scarinci Hollenbeck’s labor and employment attorneys handle complex and challenging employment law issues for employers on a worldwide basis. We counsel clients in the full range of <em>labor and employment issues</em> including Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, the Age Discrimination in Employment Act (ADEA), the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) and the Occupational Safety and Health Act (OSHA).
<div class="bg-light-gray">
<h4 class="mb-0">Litigation</h4>
</div>
When litigation proves to be the only means to resolve a conflict, our attorneys work closely with the firm’s litigation attorneys to develop and implement an<em> effective strategy to protect our client’s interests.</em>Our labor and employment attorneys are also well versed in representing our employer clients in traditional labor law matters. These may include union organizing attempts, unfair labor practices, union grievance arbitrations and injunctive proceedings to halt unlawful strikes and illegal mass picketing.

We have negotiated collective bargaining agreements in a variety of industries and with scores of unions, at both the employee and supervisory levels. We are equally experienced in representing our clients in matters involving individual contracts and early retirement agreements. We regularly assist our clients with the labor and employment aspects of acquisitions, divestiture and bankruptcy work.

Our labor and employment attorneys play a major role in counseling our clients with respect to union and human resource issues in every merger and acquisition and similar transaction in which we engage.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Partnerships</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/partnerships/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 19:42:08 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28288</guid>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck’s attorneys stand ready and able to assist you with your partnership needs.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[A partnership is an association of two or more individuals or entities through which any business, financial operation, or venture is carried on. The partnership is an entity separate from its partners. There are generally three types of partnership: General Partnerships, Limited Partnerships, and Limited Liability Partnerships. The differences among these are significant. Partnerships are governed by state law pursuant to the Uniform Partnership Act.

The partnership is formed by filing a Certificate of Partnership with the Secretary of State. It is recommended that the partners agree in writing to the terms of the partnership in the event of a dispute. A partnership agreement is a document that formalizes the relations among the partners.
<h5>A WELL-DRAFTED PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT WILL</h5>
<ul>
 	<li>state the purpose of the partnership;</li>
 	<li>determine how the profits and losses are allocated;</li>
 	<li>state if and when additional capital contributions must be made;</li>
 	<li>set forth the rights, powers, and duties of each partner; and</li>
 	<li>require partners to maintain the confidentiality of all of its customers and other business records. Also, partnership agreement language will govern whether the partnership possesses the requisite characteristics to be taxed as a partnership.</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>

					<item>
		<title>Securities Offerings &amp; Corporate Disclosures</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/securities-offerings-and-corporate-disclosure/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 19:45:52 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28289</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28981</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-17 15:45:52]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-17 19:45:52]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[securities-offerings-and-corporate-disclosure]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[We provide comprehensive counsel and representation to companies in securities offerings and in corporate governance and disclosure matters.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Experience]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our corporate and securities attorneys have been lead counsel in hundreds of public and private securities offerings and corporate transactions, including IPOs, secondary offerings, PIPE and convertible debt transactions, exchange offerings, tender offers and mergers and acquisition transactions, among others. In the many public offerings in which we have served as counsel, we have represented issuers, New York Stock Exchange member firm underwriters, selling shareholders, and selling group members. In private placements we have significant experience representing many companies raising funds through offerings of stock, of debt or of units consisting of securities and debt. We have often advised brokerage firm placement agents, registered investment advisors, institutional and high net worth investors, in securities offerings including the preparation and filing of registration statements, drafting the prospectus, conducting due diligence investigations and blue sky filings.

We frequently act as outside general counsel for our clients, advising public companies on SEC disclosure and filing requirements, as well as advising boards of directors, special committees and senior management on a broad range of business, commercial and governance matters, including corporate control, fiduciary duty and liability issues, shareholder agreements, executive compensation and employee benefits. We assist clients with implementing governance policies to comply with new regulatory requirements and have advised clients on implementation of board committee charters, codes of ethics, disclosure,controls and practices, and insider trading policies.

In addition, our securities and litigation attorneys have substantial experience in the representation of issuers, officers and directors, broker-dealers, registered representatives and individuals in a broad range of investment, compliance and employment matters, including in SEC, FINRA and state investigations and proceedings.

We have published widely in these fields, including several writings for the American Law Institute-American Bar Association, The Practical Lawyer, the past and the current New York Practice Guide Chapter on Securities Offerings published by Matthew Bender &amp; Co., and numerous articles in the New York State C.P.A. Journal, Boardroom reports and Bottom Line.

For additional information see <a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/corporate-transactions-and-business-law/investment-banking/">Investment Banking</a> and <a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/litigation/commercial-litigation/">Corporate/Shareholder Litigation.</a>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Telecommunications</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/telecommunications/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 19:50:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28291</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28291</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-17 15:50:44]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-17 19:50:44]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[telecommunications]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div id="cat-description-practice">

Our clients rely on us to help resolve impediments, take advantage of opportunities, anticipate problems, and minimize surprises down the road.

</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Areas of Service]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The telecommunications industry has seen rapid and continually evolving changes over the last several years. Deregulation has been an important focus of the Board of Public Utilities (“BPU” or “Board”), but telecommunications providers remain regulated by the BPU. Our attorneys routinely appear before the BPU on behalf of competitive local exchange carriers (CLECs) pertaining to those aspects of operations, such as licensing and corporate transactions (including mergers and acquisitions, sales of assets, changes of control and financing matters) that continue to be regulated.

We have also been involved in various rulemaking proceedings pertaining to deregulatory concerns, the need for new area codes and similar matters. In addition, disputes often arise between carriers, particularly as between CLECs and incumbent local exchange carriers, and we have represented competitors in such litigated proceedings before the Board.

The Board also regulates the cable television industry, and our office has been centrally involved in all aspects of such proceedings. From routine operational issues involving the necessity for various regulatory filings to rulemaking proceedings pertaining to new developments in the industry, our attorneys have represented the interests of major national cable television companies.

Dennis C. Linken, the head of Scarinci Hollenbeck’s Regulatory Law practice, was responsible for a landmark decision in the Superior Court of New Jersey establishing mandatory access rights on behalf of the cable television industry. We have also successfully handled numerous access proceedings before the BPU seeking enforcement of such rights with respect to multi-dwelling unit property owners.

We have also represented cable clients in many rate proceedings before the State agency. In addition to our regulatory involvement before the Board, we have handled numerous contract negotiations between CLECs and various other telecommunications providers. We have also been involved in a number of compliance proceedings before the State agency and have negotiated the satisfactory resolution of such proceedings on behalf of regulated operators.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_metadesc]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Attorneys appear before Board of Public Utilities (BPU) for regulated licensing and corporate transactions.]]></wp:meta_value>

		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Public Employment Law</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/public-employment-law/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 20:02:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>

		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The firm represents public entities in the area of labor and employment matters.
]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Clients]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our public clients include municipalities, boards of education, regional authorities, and other public boards and authorities. We regularly counsel our clients on employment matters that consist of, but are not limited to, work place harassment issues, performance evaluations, and wage compliance matters. We also represent public entities in labor negotiations with public sector unions for new collective bargaining agreements and interest arbitration hearings. Regularly, we handle grievance arbitrations and disciplinary hearings for public employers. Due to the economic decline, we have also began assisting clients who are seeking to reduce personnel expenses, which includes personnel audits and consolidation of resources to lower costs.

We also review and revise employment manuals and handbooks in conjunction with anti-harassment training for employees. We regularly appear before the administrative, state, and federal courts in New Jersey to address matters impacting public entities. We also conduct harassment investigations and evaluations of complaints. Please feel free to contact our office should you need our assistance.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Renewable Energy &amp; Green Initiatives</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/renewable-energy-green-initiatives/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 20:43:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28298</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28298</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-17 16:43:07]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-17 20:43:07]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[renewable-energy-green-initiatives]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck’s Renewable Energy and Green Initiatives Practice Group can provide you with the broad range of legal services needed to understand these new environmental and energy issues and to take advantage of the substantial opportunities that may be available to your business, municipality or school district.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA["Going Green!" Lately, you hear that phrase almost every day – from the mass media, in trade journals, at seminars, at your Chamber of Commerce and other business group meetings – practically everywhere.

Discovering what "Going Green" means to your business, municipality or school district will enable you to decide whether an economic investment in this area makes good financial sense even in these challenging times. A complex web of regulations, government programs, financial incentives, leasing issues and practical considerations confront you.

You need advice from professionals who understand both the legal and practical business decisions you make every day. At Scarinci Hollenbeck, we see "Going Green" developments as opportunities for businesses, municipalities and school districts. Please contact us if you would like to discuss how we might work together to realize these opportunities in this challenging area.

For many years, our land use, environmental and redevelopment attorneys have directed large, complex and challenging projects, including energy projects, through the maze of regulatory agencies that confront developers in New Jersey and the NY/NJ metropolitan region. If you are a developer evaluating whether to move forward with a new energy facility, such as a solar installation or wind project, our attorneys can identify necessary permitting, evaluate the likelihood of obtaining those approvals, and represent you in obtaining approvals.

Advising municipalities and school districts regarding the public contracting process for energy efficiency contracts, solar energy contracts and third party energy contracts.

The following are examples of our experience in dealing with projects in this area:
<ul>
 	<li>We obtained New Jersey Board of Public Utilities' approval of a power purchase agreement that made one of the first landfill gas-to-energy facilities in the State economically viable. We also provided legal counsel in obtaining a grant from the BPU for another landfill gas-to-energy project. Our work resulted in the siting of these two projects and the sale of gas from a private landfill client for use as fuel. These facilities have a gross capacity of 4.8 MW and 9.4 MW respectively and, combined, they comprise the largest landfill gas-to-energy facility complex in the State.</li>
 	<li>We represent a private company that is constructing a major electric energy conversion facility and transmission capability in multiple counties and municipalities in the State. We obtained numerous land use approvals, environmental permits, site remediation approval, right of way agreements, easement agreements and other necessary approvals and entitlements in connection with this project.</li>
 	<li>We represent building owners and solar installation companies with respect to power purchase agreements.</li>
 	<li>We provided legal counsel to a utilities authority in connection with (i) the sale of carbon credits generated by the authority's voluntary capture and destruction of the methane gas by-product of its landfill operation; and (ii) the construction and operation of a landfill gas-to-energy facility.</li>
 	<li>We represented a major aggregate supply company as it converted its energy supply from diesel to electric to reduce air emissions and fuel consumption.</li>
 	<li>We provide legal counsel to one of the largest recycling companies in the United States.</li>
 	<li>We provide legal counsel to an innovative technology company engaged in conversion of vegetative waste to energy and fertilizer products.</li>
 	<li>We participated in the implementation of a LEED initiative as part of the development of one of the largest commercial projects in New Jersey. We have obtained and are obtaining land use approvals for developers proposing LEED-certified or other Green buildings.</li>
</ul>
At Scarinci Hollenbeck, we see "Going Green" developments as opportunities for businesses, municipalities and school districts. Please contact us if you would like to discuss how we might work together to realize these opportunities in this challenging area.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Areas of Service]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<h4 class="bg-light-gray">Our Services Include The Following:</h4>
<ul>
 	<li>Explain energy efficiency and renewable energy regulations that may provide property owners, tenants, and governmental entities with opportunities to reduce energy costs and increase property values.</li>
 	<li>Help businesses evaluate State and Federal financial incentives, such as Solar Renewable Energy Certificates, and the 30% federal grant or investment tax credit that may make an investment in energy efficiency or renewable energy a profitable decision. We can keep business and public clients updated on the constantly changing laws, regulations and governmental programs and incentives in this area.</li>
 	<li>Help property owners and tenants structure deals to maximize the financial benefits from investing in energy efficiency and renewable energy initiatives, particularly solar installations.</li>
 	<li>To maximize the economic benefits of the installation of solar, wind or energy efficiency improvements, we can help identify vendors and contractors, negotiate and draft the relevant agreements with vendors, and assist with obtaining the maximum financial incentives and tax credits.</li>
 	<li>Obtain approvals from local, state and/or federal regulatory agencies and other government entities required for new energy systems or improvements, such as solar and wind installations.</li>
 	<li>Analyze LEED and other green building standards for builders, property owners, municipalities or school districts that are considering new construction or substantial renovations. We can also assist in selecting certified contractors, identifying and applying for State and Federal financial incentives related to the project, and obtaining necessary permit approvals.</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Corporate Tax Planning</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/corporate-tax-planning/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 20:46:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28299</guid>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Corporate taxation although inherently complex is an integral and essential part of the short, intermediate and long term vision of any business. Tax planning represents an opportunity to improve profits and the return on capital, increase cash flow and avoid unexpected impositions (penalties) for failing to observe the rules.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our tax attorneys have additional credentials that include three Masters in Tax Law, two certified public accounting certificates. Knowledge and experience are crucial to successfully navigating the complex statutes, regulations and rulings that populate this area of the law. Advice must not only be accurate, but also must be timely in order to permit the client to attain its business goals in a tax efficient manner.

Our attorneys advise clients and accounting firms in matters relating to methods of accounting, capitalization rules, consolidated return issues, sales and acquisitions. The form of an acquisition may be by merger or asset purchase. Corporate joint ventures and partnerships or limited liability companies play an increasing role in the strategies of our clients. We advise clients on exit strategies, such as outright sales, stock redemptions and corporate divisions. In addition, we are heavily involved with executive compensation and the compliance issues associated with Section 409A.

Our tax attorneys welcome the opportunity to discuss your particular circumstances and how we might add value to your business.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Deal Structure &amp; Guidance</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/deal-structure-guidance/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2019 20:58:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28300</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28300</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-17 16:58:03]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-17 20:58:03]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[deal-structure-guidance]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Much of our advisory service consists of analyzing and structuring a variety of sophisticated transactions for a wide range of domestic and international clients. The objective is to provide outstanding client service in providing sophisticated advice in an efficient manner.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The optimal tax structure must work in concert with the business objectives and economic realities of the transaction. Our attorneys focus on identifying the client’s goals and in understanding the circumstances of the parties in the transaction. This direct communication enables our advice to be practical yet valuable. The globalization of the economy has resulted in an ever-increasing number of cross-border transactions, both inbound and outbound. Particular attention is paid to the international tax aspects of a structure because transfer pricing, treaties, withholding taxes and the additional complexity associated with such transactions. Our emphasis on understanding a client’s circumstances early in the engagement enables our advice to be a comprehensive and effective, while permitting the transaction to close in a timely manner.

Our clients consist of sophisticated individuals, family-owned businesses, REITs and closely-held entities. Any advice rendered to an individual should be consistent with an efficient estate plan. In family and closely-held settings, it is important to document the relationship among the participants in an agreement that addresses death, disability, voluntary withdrawal, valuation and resolution of management issues. Equally important is the focus on liquidity in estate planning as the business typically represents a substantial portion of the taxable estate. A consistent theme is the requirement that the guidance provide an efficient exit strategy from the structure. We represent clients in a diverse number of industries from virtualization, manufacturing, real estate development and management of real estate owned. We welcome the opportunity to discuss such matters with you.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>

					<item>
		<title>Public Contracts</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/public-contracts/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 14:03:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28308</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28308</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 10:03:03]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 14:03:03]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[public-contracts]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[This firm counsels all types of public entities on compliance with the Local Public Contracts Law and the Pay to Play laws.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The State has been focusing attention on the use of Best Practices for the award of all service contracts. They have imposed strict oversight requirements on a public entity that failed to comply with bid requirements. We have formulated best practices templates and guidance for public entities. There is a need to be aware of the interplay between Pay to Play requirements for contracts that are exempt from bidding under the Local Public Contracts Law.

We provide that guidance and procedures for public agencies. Our firm’s expertise includes drafting bid specifications, contracts and requests for proposals. We have defended our clients in bid protests and other challenges to the award of contracts.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Appellate Practice</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/appellate-practice/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 14:20:49 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28317</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28317</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 10:20:49]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 14:20:49]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[appellate-practice]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:1:{i:0;s:5:"28959";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Understanding the federal and state appellate processes is imperative to conducting a successful appeal. Our appellate practitioners have the means to facilitate support, even when complex issues confront you.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Once a case has been tried and post-trial motions have been decided, it is often presumed that a case is over. However, this is a common oversight, especially in today’s litigious world, where appeals are often pursued and legal disputes may continue for quite some time. With that being said, an appeal’s success substantially depends on counsel’s ability to evaluate the factors and risks that are involved, which include identifying the arguments either underpinning or undermining a successful appeal, and fully understanding the trial and appellate processes to persuade appellate judges to rule in the client’s favor.

At Scarinci Hollenbeck, our veteran appellate practitioners, some who were law clerks to Appellate Judges and N.J. Supreme Court Justices, have gained an intimate knowledge of the appellate process that trial lawyers, who may only occasionally be involved in an appeal, do not possess. Our attorneys have won on appeal precedent setting matters. Our appellate attorneys also have the advantage of corresponding with colleagues in virtually every area of law, providing them with the breadth of knowledge necessary to assess any appeal appropriately. As a result, we have significant advantages in advising clients whether an appeal is warranted and what its chances of success may be.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Areas of Service]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Much of the firm’s appellate work is referred by other lawyers and law firms seeking our assessment of the matter. We then conduct rigorous research, prepare well-reasoned arguments, and write persuasive, compelling briefs to advance the client’s position. With the decades of experience our appellate lawyers possess and their proven ability to support and counsel clients even in the most complex appeals, Scarinci Hollenbeck has assembled a select group of accomplished appellate practitioners who have specialized knowledge, insight and experience to obtain the best possible result for the client. Our appellate lawyers have guided clients through trials and appeals involving a variety of significant legal issues, which include:
<ul class="custom-inner-list">
 	<li>Business Torts and Other Commercial Disputes</li>
 	<li>Corporate Governance Disputes</li>
 	<li>Constitutional Law</li>
 	<li>Employment and Discrimination Issues</li>
 	<li>Land Use Applications</li>
 	<li>Local Government Law</li>
 	<li>Medical and Other Professional Malpractice Claims</li>
 	<li>Product Liability Law</li>
 	<li>Criminal Law</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
