		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[By combining innovative strategies with business advisory and crisis management skills, we guide our clients through the turmoil surrounding financially troubled and bankrupt companies, set priorities, and allocate resources to maximize the prospects for effective recovery.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[We are highly skilled in the enforcement of creditors’ rights and work with various financial institutions, corporations, insurance companies, leasing and finance companies and other organizations and business entities interested in preserving and enforcing their rights as creditors. Our attorneys routinely advise creditors regarding their rights and remedies in bankruptcy, under the Uniform Commercial Code, in foreclosures and in other types of recovery of real and personal property, secured and unsecured transactions, and other areas of commercial law.

In doing so, we bring together attorneys with broad and diverse business experience in order to help the firm’s clients achieve creative, expeditious, and cost-effective solutions. When appropriate, on matters requiring an interdisciplinary approach, attorneys often consult with other attorneys within Scarinci Hollenbeck’s comprehensive Corporate Transaction &amp; Business, Commercial Real Estate, Crisis &amp; Risk Management, Insurance &amp; Liability, eDiscovery, Environmental &amp; Land Use and, in some instances, International Law &amp; Trade practice groups. Amply resourced, this extensive business and corporate law expertise enables Scarinci Hollenbeck to regularly achieve more favorable results for its clients.

Scarinci Hollenbeck delivers comprehensive services to financially impacted entities, including financial institutions, corporations, insurance companies, leasing and finance companies, and other organizations and businesses involved in the recovery and potential or actual restructuring of problem business credits.

Our attorneys are accustomed to dealing with complex and sophisticated business matters and have many years of experience handling all financial issues surrounding bankruptcy and reorganization, out of court workouts, and state and federal court litigation over creditors’ and debtors’ rights. Our Group Chair, Joel R. Glucksman, has been named to the “New Jersey Super Lawyers” list continuously since 2007. The list, published by Super Lawyers Magazine, is an annual listing of outstanding lawyers from more than 60 practice areas who have attained a high degree of peer recognition and professional achievement.

Where litigation is necessary to resolve debt and related problems, we offer responsive and effective service at all levels, including alternative dispute resolution, prejudgment remedies, and a renowned trial and appellate practice. Knowing that a strong litigation position often leads to a settlement of the dispute, our attorneys are practiced strategists who make every effort to set the table for the negotiation of a favorable and carefully documented workout of creditor-debtor disputes.

The Super Lawyers list is issued by Thomson Reuters. A description of the selection methodology can be found at <a href="https://www.superlawyers.com/about/selection_process.html">http://www.superlawyers.com/about/selection/process.html</a>. No aspect of this advertisement has been approved by the Supreme Court of New Jersey.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The Bankruptcy and Creditors’ Rights Group handles bankruptcy and debt recovery cases for both secured and unsecured creditors. Attorneys represent individuals, partnerships and corporations, and have significant experience in dealing with the numerous problems such entities face in dealing with both large and small business debtors. Group attorneys regularly counsel clients in the areas of
<ul class="custom-inner-list">
 	<li>Bankruptcies</li>
 	<li>Receiverships</li>
 	<li>Leveraged buy-outs</li>
 	<li>Preferences and fraudulent conveyances</li>
 	<li>Workouts</li>
 	<li>Debt restructuring</li>
 	<li>Reorganizations and liquidations</li>
 	<li>Mortgage foreclosures</li>
 	<li>OREO sales transactions</li>
 	<li>UCC foreclosures and acquisitions</li>
 	<li>Construction liens</li>
 	<li>Receivables factoring</li>
 	<li>Municipal tax claims</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Creditor Collections</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/creditor-collections/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 17:41:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28347</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28347</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 13:41:04]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 17:41:04]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[creditor-collections]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div id="cat-description-practice">

Scarinci Hollenbeck assists clients with <strong>all forms of creditor collection, </strong>including, secured and unsecured debts. Our matters can be simple or complex.  We provide service in the collection and recovery of debts owed to businesses, organizations, property owners, financial institutions, or individuals.

</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Often, the best step in resolving debt issues is a legal one. In many instances, the mere presence and participation of a knowledgeable creditors’ attorney can bring a reluctant debtor to heel. In some cases, litigation is necessary. Either way, the Creditor Collections Group uses innovative and collaborative fee structures with its clients in order to help reduce legal expenses and maximize our clients’ total net recovery.

The Group also provides advice and assistance in <strong>reducing future debt collection problems.</strong> By helping clients develop business contracts and procedures that reduce the risk of litigation going forward, and by drafting clear contract provisions that set the terms more favorably for our clients in the event they do face litigation in the future, the Creditor Collections Group helps set the table for effective, expedited collections and the prospect of maximum recovery.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Areas of Service]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our attorneys are accustomed to dealing with everything from simple demand letters<strong> to complex and sophisticated business matters</strong> and have many years of experience in handling the myriad financial and legal issues related to debt collection.

As an extension of the firm’s Litigation Department, the Creditor Collections Group provides effective debt collection representation in <strong>many different types of commercial matters,</strong> including actions brought under the Uniform Commercial Code, tax sale certificate collection, and redemption and execution in foreclosure proceedings. The Group also represents banks and other financial companies in litigation to collect debts and unpaid loans, assists professional service organizations in <strong>collecting unpaid fees</strong> for services rendered, and also represents residential and commercial property owners in obtaining unpaid rent from their tenants.

In addition, with assistance from attorneys in the firm’s<strong> Bankruptcy and Creditors’ Rights Group, </strong>the Creditor Collections Group represents creditors in enforcing their rights in Bankruptcy proceedings.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>

					<item>
		<title>Civil Rights</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/civil-rights/</link>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Civil Rights sub-group has built a solid reputation for managing multifaceted constitutional law claims against our municipal clients in Federal and State Courts.
]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Civil rights claims often are intertwined with complex tort claims, including claims made under New Jersey’s Wrongful Death Act. Often, the facts of these cases bring with them the need to recognize and factor heightened sensitivities. Yet we have been successful in navigating through difficult fact patterns and achieving positive results. In all, our civil rights litigation sub-group, Litigation Chair Robert E. Levy, and other attorneys at Scarinci Hollenbeck, are dedicated to and highly capable of achieving the best results for our clients, whether they are individuals or entities, when they are confronted with civil rights and other constitutionally based complaints.

We have successfully prosecuted civil rights claims and defended clients against civil rights complaints, including those alleging First Amendment violations, Due Process and Equal Protection violations, Age and Sex Discrimination claims and other violations of the United States and State Constitutions. In the process, we have strived to and have achieved a balance between the ardent defense of our clients and the serious application of Constitutional law. It is this combination of an intricate investigation and knowledge of the facts of a case applied to the practiced understanding of Constitutional jurisprudence that allows us to manage best the defense of cases with our clients. We have represented our clients in many precedent setting cases in both the Federal and State Courts. We have been retained by state and local legislative bodies to provide analysis of constitutional questions presented to them.
]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Crisis &amp; Risk Management</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/crisis-risk-management/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 14:53:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28320</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28996</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 10:53:54]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 14:53:54]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[crisis-risk-management]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck’s Crisis and Risk Management Group provides clients with innovative, real-time solutions aimed at not only addressing a rapidly evolving crisis or emergency but also assessing potential threats and finding the best ways to avoid or mitigate those threats.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The Crisis and Risk Management practice group is unique to Scarinci Hollenbeck. Our attorneys assist organizations and individuals with all aspects of emergency response, including crisis assessment, development and implementation of crisis response plans and internal policies and procedures, and evacuation plans. We have extensive experience in the growing field of risk management, including the identification of potential threats and the development of practical solutions that offer the best ways to avoid or mitigate those threats.

The Crisis and Risk Management group mobilizes an interdisciplinary team of professionals and assists with the implementation of response strategies aimed at addressing rapidly evolving crises. The group is comprised of former law enforcement officials, including federal and state prosecutors and lawyers recognized as leaders in their respective fields of law. Together, the team works to provide clients with innovative, real-time solutions that help create a safer, more profitable work environment.
<h4 class="bg-light-gray">Our Services</strong></h4>
<h5 class="mt-2 mb-1"> Emergency Response </h5>
Our Crisis Management attorneys understand that sophisticated crisis management counseling begins long before disaster strikes. We work closely with clients to develop custom-tailored crisis management plans, including establishing appropriate metrics for determining when and how to implement an effective crisis response.

In today’s fast-paced and globalized business environment, organizations are more vulnerable than ever. Advancements in technology continue to shape business operations and relations and, as a result, organizations face new and complex challenges every day. We provide counseling to help prepare clients for a wide variety of crises, from large-scale data breaches, to internal corporate investigations, to federal investigations and oversight, to high-profile reputational threats, to natural disasters.

Our local access to federal and state authorities and a global alliance of legal and technical professionals enable our team to address the most urgent of client needs. We are acutely aware of the financial and public relations fallout that often result from an unexpected crisis, and mobilize our interdisciplinary team of professionals to mitigate unexpected consequences.

We have extensive experience in technology, banking and finance, consumer protection, employment, international law, intellectual property, health care, and litigation. In addition, our lawyers have hands-on business experience that enables them to provide strategic business consulting on all aspects of information policy, including privacy, information security, and records management.
<h5 class="mt-2 mb-1">High-Profile Reputational</h5>
When an unexpected event occurs that could have a negative impact on an organization’s or individual’s reputation, our team coordinates efforts to communicate accurately and effectively with the public and stakeholders while at the same time maintaining focus on the legal aspect of the crisis. Crises impacting one’s reputation may include misdeeds, skewed management decisions, deceptive acts, and misconduct. The stakes are high when discontented individuals and special interest groups fight individuals, businesses, and other interest groups to win acceptance of their demands and expectations. These threats usually occur in the form of boycotts, picketing, sit-ins, ultimatums to those in authority, blockade or occupation of buildings, resisting or disobeying authority, and Internet defamation.
<h5 class="mt-2 mb-1">White Collar Criminal Defense & Internal Investigation</h5>
Our team represents clients in a variety of criminal matters, including the defense of allegations of white collar crimes. Our criminal defense attorneys are former prosecutors and certified criminal trial attorneys. We have extensive experience representing individuals and businesses that are summoned as witnesses before federal and state grand jury proceedings. We conduct internal investigations for businesses that suspect wrongdoing by their employees and agents. In the event criminal charges or regulatory offenses are filed, we provide strategic counseling to our clients from the outset and stand with them through trial.
<h5 class="mt-2 mb-1">Hostile Work Environment</h5>
We assist organizations in maintaining safe and risk-free working environments for their employees. We assist clients with:
<ul>
 	<li>Policies and procedures</li>
 	<li>Background checks</li>
 	<li>Web safety for employees and students</li>
 	<li>Employee handbooks</li>
 	<li>Harassment and diversity training for employees and management</li>
 	<li>Threat assessment</li>
 	<li>Internal fraud investigations</li>
 	<li>Internal hostile work environment investigations.</li>
</ul>
<h5 class="mt-2 mb-1">Political Activity Law</h5>
With new laws impacting political activity and increased scrutiny involving political contributions, our team of attorneys versed on the intricacies of political activity law can assist clients in adhering to laws and regulations concerning political donations. We assist with:
<ul>
 	<li>Campaign finance laws</li>
 	<li>Administrative proceedings</li>
 	<li>Compliance</li>
 	<li></li>
 	<li>Creation of political action committees.</li>
 	<li>White collar criminal defense and internal investigations</li>
</ul>
<h5 class="mt-2 mb-1">Natural Disaster Recovery</h5>
We assist our clients in effectively managing natural disasters that have the potential to cause significant business and operational interruptions. We assist clients with:
<ul>
 	<li>Evacuation planning – we are experienced in developing, implementing and testing evacuation plans of all sizes for private businesses, public agencies, and state entities</li>
 	<li>Emergency planning/contingency planning</li>
 	<li>Security planning</li>
 	<li>Threat assessment – we help organizations looking to prevent or manage threats of violence and assist in the management of the aftermath of actual violent incidents</li>
 	<li>Coordinate all phases of crisis response, including notifying federal and state authorities and conducting post-crisis clinics and assessments</li>
 	<li>Develop and implement strategic communication plans to ensure proper and effective disclosure</li>
</ul>
<h5 class="mt-2 mb-1">Cyber Security &amp; Data Protection</h5>
<ul>
 	<li>Experienced in developing and implementing data breach response programs, our attorneys assist clients with the coordination of criminal and civil responses following a data breach. Businesses that possess personally identifiable information have numerous obligations and responsibilities under state, federal, and – in some cases – international law. Businesses have a responsibility to safeguard proprietary, confidential, and trade-secret information, and they must also comply with the laws that pertain to their possession or ownership of consumer or employee data.</li>
 	<li>We have extensive experience in technology, banking and finance, consumer protection, employment, international law, intellectual property, health care, and litigation. In addition, our lawyers have hands-on business experience that enables them to provide strategic business consulting on all aspects of information policy, including privacy, information security, and records management.</li>
 	<li>To learn more, check out our Cyber Security and Data Protection offerings.</li>
</ul>
<h5 class="mt-2 mb-1">High-Profile Reputational Risk Management</h5>
We leverage our in-depth experience in core business disciplines – insurance, tax, corporate, regulatory, and administrative law – to assist organizations and individuals in assessing potential risk and minimizing exposure to future liability.

Members of the Risk Management Group work closely with senior executives, general counsel, small business owners, and other key personnel to provide ongoing counseling on a wide variety of matters involving risk and liability.

We offer a full range of risk management services, including:
<ul>
 	<li>Developing and implementing comprehensive risk management plans</li>
 	<li>Negotiating and drafting insurance policies and coverage</li>
 	<li>Assisting with compliance of regulatory and statutory-based requirements</li>
 	<li>Addressing unique insurable needs, such as cyber coverageConducting timely audits of business operations and practices to assess current and future exposure</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck’s Commercial Litigation Group has extensive experience in representing businesses before both state and federal trial and appellate courts.
]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our attorneys have successfully represented our clients’ interests in all types of commercial contract disputes with competitors, customers, and other parties to contracts, including governmental agencies. We also litigate the rights of owners, contractors, and subcontractors in claims based on various construction contracts.

Our litigators have obtained significant awards in sophisticated, commercial foreclosures throughout New Jersey. Furthermore, we have achieved favorable results in both the prosecution and defense of lawsuits for the commissions of brokers’ and manufacturers’ representatives, as well as in suits for the reformation and rescission of contracts. The goal of our Commercial Litigation Group is to protect our clients’ interests, with a cost effective approach through negotiated resolution of disputes and, if necessary, through aggressive and efficient litigation.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[We appear in matters ranging from pre-construction planning, construction, litigation, and dispute resolution.

Our attorneys regularly provide advice regarding New Jersey’s Construction Lien Law, out-of-state mechanics lien issues, Municipal Lien Law state contracts, contract formation, and the adaptation of standard contract forms (American Institute of Architects, Associated General Contractors, Engineers Joint Contracts, and Federal Construction Contracts) to specific client requirements. We have additionally drafted many custom contracts for projects.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Corporate, Partnerships, &amp; LLC Disputes</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/corporate-partnerships-llc-disputes/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 14:45:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28324</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28999</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 10:45:07]]></wp:post_date>

		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>

		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>

		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck’s attorneys have many years of experience in representing business entities, including corporations, partnerships, and limited liability companies, and their directors, officers, shareholders, and partners.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our group has handled all types of internal and external disputes, with the focus on efficient and economic resolution. When litigation has developed, our litigators have aggressively pursued our clients’ interests, and have obtained successful results in both the prosecution and defense of claims. In a recent multi-state dispute between general and limited partners, enforcement of a capital-call provision in a partnership agreement was summarily achieved, resulting in the acquisition of the limited partners’ interests by the general partner.
]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079bee5365]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[In the area of family law, we handle both simple and complex divorce cases, embracing (a) financial issues of permanent and limited duration spousal support; equitable distribution of property acquired during the marriage, and the valuation of assets, and (b) the non-financial parenting issues of custody, visitation, and investigation into best interest determinations affecting children.

Our involvement spans the time frame from the onset of the matrimonial dispute through post judgment applications and appeals. We also negotiate and prepare prenuptial, postnuptial, and property settlement agreements.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Criminal Defense</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/criminal-defense/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 14:50:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28326</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>29001</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 10:50:54]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 14:50:54]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[criminal-defense]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck represents clients in a variety of criminal matters which include the defense nationwide of allegations of white collar crimes.
]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Areas of Service]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our criminal defense attorneys include former prosecutors and certified criminal trial attorneys. Our representation often begins prior to the filing of formal charges and includes pre-indictment analysis. Our lawyers understand that it is often advisable to speak with prosecuting authorities before charges are filed. Once charges are brought we are familiar with and utilize various pre-trial procedures to advance our client’s interests. Our criminal trial attorneys have extensive trial experience. If a case proceeds to trial they have a history of mounting aggressive and persuasive defenses predicated upon the applicable facts and law.

<strong>We have extensive experience representing individuals and businesses in the following areas:</strong>
<ul class="custom-inner-list">
 	<li>Defense of various State and Federal criminal, civil, administrative and regulatory matters including R.I.C.O, federal bank fraud and corruption prosecutions.</li>
 	<li>Criminal investigations and prosecutions under the direction of the United States Attorney’s Office, the Drug Enforcement Administration, the Securities and Exchange Commission, the Internal Revenue Service and the Department of Immigration and Customs Enforcement;</li>
 	<li>Criminal investigations and prosecutions under the direction of the New Jersey Attorney General, which include the Office of the Insurance Fraud Prosecutor, the Board of Medical Examiners, and the New Jersey Board of Dentistry;</li>
 	<li>Criminal investigations and prosecutions under the direction of county prosecutors for all violent crimes, thefts, and drug offenses;</li>
 	<li>Professional licensing issues before state and federal licensing boards;</li>
 	<li>Representation of witnesses, including those in their professional capacity, subpoenaed before Federal and State Grand Juries.</li>
 	<li>Professional licensing issues before state and federal licensing boards;</li>
 	<li>Internal audits/investigations for businesses who suspect wrongdoing by their employees and agents</li>
 	<li>Federal and State plea negotiations, trials, and appeals;</li>
 	<li>Post conviction matters including appeals, Intensive Supervision applications and hearings, conditional discharge, and other diversionary programs; and</li>
 	<li>Expungement of arrest and conviction records.</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>eDiscovery</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/ediscovery/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 14:58:13 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28327</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>29002</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 10:58:13]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 14:58:13]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[ediscovery]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck counsels institutional clients in understanding and complying with laws, court rules, and common law obligations that govern information management in the context of a lawsuit and corporate compliance in a manner that not only addresses their legal obligation, but also the practical business considerations that allow for a business to continue to operate unimpeded by what can be seemingly daunting obligations.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Federal and state judiciaries have amended their respective court rules to impose significant obligations on attorneys, corporate and individual clients, and parties to a lawsuit regarding electronically stored information (commonly referred to as “ESI” or “eDiscovery”). The impact of these rules and obligations goes far beyond the lawyers and parties who are involved in a lawsuit, and requires input and compliance from various departments, including HR, IT, Risk Management, and Legal, of any business. Recent court decisions have imposed heavy sanctions on businesses that were unable to respond effectively to discovery requests. Although these amendments place new obligations on companies, a recent survey found that only 7% of corporate attorneys consider their companies prepared for the court rules that govern eDiscovery.

Our Response to Electronic Discovery &amp; Information (REDI) Group assists clients in understanding and complying with laws, court rules, and common law obligations that govern information management in the context of a lawsuit in a manner that not only addresses the legal obligation, but also the practical business considerations that allow for a business to continue to operate unimpeded by what can be seemingly daunting obligations. The identification, preservation, collection, review, and production of massive amounts of ESI have introduced litigation risks and costs previously unknown. REDI is dedicated to providing counsel to address the proliferation of information technology that has made it difficult for a company to know what information is within its control, and how to manage that information to reduce litigation risk and comply with various laws.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Areas of Service]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<h4 class="bg-light-gray">The REDI Group Provides Counseling & Litigation Services:</h4>
<ul class="custom-inner-list">
 	<li>Advise on records and information management, including the development of policies and plans to effectively manage multiple data sources across multiple offices</li>
 	<li>Regularly update corporate document retention policies and procedures</li>
 	<li>Audit retention procedures</li>
 	<li>Identify industry-specific data storage requirements such as those required by HIPAA, OSHA, EEOC, and SEC</li>
 	<li>Manage risk and control costs</li>
 	<li>Promote education and outreach</li>
 	<li>Advise on litigation readiness</li>
 	<li>Assist in litigation hold issuance and compliance</li>
 	<li>Serve as eDiscovery neutrals (e.g., eDiscovery special master) by judicial appointment</li>
 	<li>Prosecute and defend lawsuits with significant e-discovery aspects</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_2_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Background]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_2_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_2_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[We understand the importance of minimizing a lawsuit’s impact on the day-to-day business activities of our clients’ operations. In order to assist our clients in addressing their legal obligations in connection with eDiscovery rules, we gathered an interdisciplinary team comprised of trial lawyers, corporate and securities lawyers, intellectual property lawyers, labor and employment lawyers, and technology specialists to form the REDI Group. REDI builds off of Scarinci Hollenbeck’s strong litigation foundation of handling complex litigation involving massive amounts of documents including ESI, offers clients comprehensive programs through on-going counseling, and assists companies in a broad range of needs from prevention to defense.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_2_content]]></wp:meta_key>

					<item>
		<title>Franchise &amp; Distribution Disputes</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/franchise-distribution-disputes/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 15:00:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28328</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>29003</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 11:00:23]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 15:00:23]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[franchise-distribution-disputes]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck represents franchisors, franchisees and other businesses owners in franchise and distribution disputes.
]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our attorneys have knowledge and expertise in handling various types of franchise disputes, both on behalf of franchisors and franchisees. For example, we can assist companies in protecting their valuable marks and contract rights and work with franchises in evaluating domestic and international franchise opportunities. We have been involved in disputes over ownership rights, distribution of franchise revenues and profit, Federal Trade Commission and other regulatory oversight issues, and franchise disclosure documents. We represent clients in litigation when necessary. We provide strategic advice on the interplay between franchise and intellectual property issues, in order to prepare our clients to protect their valuable intellectual property or withstand potential liability.

We counsel our clients as to the effect that bankruptcy and insolvency may have on franchise rights. This includes assisting them in maximizing recovery during workouts, protecting their assets in bankruptcy court disputes, and helping them to structure their business relationships. We also handle matters involving manufacturer/distributor disputes, and licensing law.

The attorneys at Scarinci Hollenbeck can provide strategic counseling for any issue your business may have involving franchise and distribution issues disputes.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The firm actively works to help clients pursue, secure, and monetize copyrights. Additionally, the firm ensures that clients’ copyrights are not violated and that enforcement, litigation, and claims are pursued in appropriate forums. We use a collaborative approach to IP services in both the transactional sector and in the litigation realm.

The client-centered strategic and collaborative approach identifies client aims, provides a budget, and defines success metrics. Based on this blueprint, we propose and pursue IP remedies and protections, affording clients optimal legal protections in the present and in the future.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Copyright Infingement]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Works, such as books, articles, songs, paintings and photographs, are protected by copyright the moment they are created. Problems arise when a client's work is reproduced without permission and without compensation.

In investigating copyright infringement cases, the firm's IP attorneys review:
<ul>
 	<li>Access — Did the infringer have access to the work in order to copy it?</li>
 	<li>Copyright — Who possesses the legal right to the work in question and is a copyright registered?</li>
 	<li>Perpetrator — Who is the actual infringer of the copyright?</li>
 	<li>Damages — What are the quantifiable costs of the infringement?</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Licensing Copyrights]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[In addition to helping clients register their copyrights and enforce their interest against infringement, the firm's IP attorneys also advise clients on monetizing their copyrights through licenses and other agreements.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_2_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Trademarks]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_2_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_2_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Trademarks and service marks can be words, names, symbols or other subject matter used to identify and distinguish a company's products or services from those of competitors and other businesses. Trademarks and service marks are essential to the brands and audiences that our clients build. The firm's clients rely on the use of trademarks to ensure that similar words, symbols, and names are not used by competing companies to dilute the value of their enterprises and efforts. Our attorneys help to secure and enforce national and international trademarks and service marks on behalf of clients.

<a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/trademark-law">Scarinci Hollenbeck's Trademark Law Practice</a>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Domain Name Dispute Resolution</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/domain-name-dispute-resolution/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 15:21:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28330</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>29005</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 11:21:20]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 15:21:20]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[domain-name-dispute-resolution]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:1:{i:0;s:5:"28928";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div id="cat-description-practice">

How brand names appear on the web is an integral part of an organization’s brand identity. We offer our clients a full spectrum of services to support their online identities by establishing, maintaining, protecting, and enforcing their business or entity’s online trademark rights, copyrights, and domain names.

</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[How brand names appear on the web is an integral part of an organization’s brand identity. We offer our clients a full spectrum of services to support their online identities by establishing, maintaining, protecting, and enforcing their business or entity’s online trademark rights, copyrights, and domain names.

Our attorneys are highly experienced in assisting clients in developing viable domain name strategies tailored to their individual needs. We work with clients to create and select effective domain names and assist them with the acquisition, registration, and enforcement of brand name rights on the web.

<strong>Our domain name protection service offerings include:</strong>
<ul>
 	<li>Recording companies’ trademark portfolios with the Trademark Clearinghouse;</li>
 	<li>Developing and implementing sunrise registration strategies. The sunrise period precedes general domain name registration availability. It is a special period during which trademark holders may preregister names that are the same or similar to their trademarks to avoid cybersquatting;</li>
 	<li>Developing and implementing sunrise registration strategies. The sunrise period precedes general domain name registration availability. It is a special period during which trademark holders may preregister names that are the same or similar to their trademarks to avoid cybersquatting;</li>
 	<li>Policing and monitoring of gTLDs for infringing uses of trademarks as cybersquatters move in on new domains;</li>
 	<li>Bringing URS, UDRP,PDDRP and other actions to quickly secure trademark holders’ rights when a registration violates a client’s rights;</li>
 	<li>Assignment, merger, name change, and security interest recordation services;</li>
 	<li>Civil actions under Anti-Cybersquatting Piracy Act (ACPA);</li>
 	<li>Domain name registration and dispute resolution;</li>
 	<li>Keyword and sponsored link advertising on search engines;</li>
 	<li>Negotiation of domain name transfer agreements and releases;</li>
 	<li>Registration of domain names, including advice regarding defensive registrations;</li>
 	<li>Selection, procurement, protection, recovery, and enforcement of domain names; and</li>
 	<li>TLD strategies.</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Areas of Service]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<h4 class="bg-light-gray">Anti-Cybersquatting & Uniform Domain-name Dispute Resolution Policy (UDRP) Proceedings</h4>
The Uniform Domain-Name Dispute-Resolution Policy (UDRP) offered through the Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN) is a quicker and less-costly proceeding than federal litigation that allows trademark owners to challenge an infringing domain name registration. Our attorneys have extensive experience assisting clients who seek to protect their trademark rights through UDRP proceedings. We routinely handle UDRP proceedings before agencies such as the World Intellectual Property Office and the National Arbitration Forum. David Einhorn, chair of our Technology Law Practice, has decided over 250 UDRP cases as arbitrator.
<h4 class="bg-light-gray">ACPA Proceedings/Cybersquatting</h4>
The 1999 Anticybersquatting Consumer Protection Act (ACPA) provides additional protection against cybersquatters who register domain names in bad faith, and provides the opportunity to obtain monetary damages. Scarinci Hollenbeck represents clients in ACPA proceedings in the federal court.
<h4 class="bg-light-gray">Trademark Issues & Claims Involving Social Media</h4>
The continued growth in social media usage has generated a host of potential trademark issues. We safeguard our clients’ social media presence, protecting them against the unauthorized use of their marks. Scarinci Hollenbeck attorneys are well-versed on everything from trademark protection for hashtags, user names, and brand identities to compliance with social media policies.
<h4 class="bg-light-gray">New Generic Top-Level Domain Names</h4>
The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN), the entity established to oversee operation of the Internet, recently created a new gTLD program. This led to the creation of more than 1,000 new gTLDs, beginning in 2013. The existing environment of generic top-level domains (gTLDs), such as .com, .net, and .org, is vastly expanding, causing both serious and immediate concerns and significant opportunities for businesses.

Our attorneys have experience guiding clients through the gTLD landscape and have helped formulate protection mechanisms for trademark holders in the new system. Whether you are a brand owner or applicant, we can assist you wide range of issues pertaining to the launch of the new gTLDs, including:
<ul>
 	<li>Developing a brand-protection strategy;</li>
 	<li>Maximizing opportunities the new gTLDs offer to acquire desirable domain names;</li>
 	<li>Positioning you or your company to be awarded the gTLD(s) and second level domain names for which you have applied;</li>
 	<li>Assisting with ICANN registry contracts and vendor agreements;</li>
 	<li>Complying with the gTLD rules and competition laws if you will be operating an open generic TLD;</li>
 	<li>Navigating numerous dispute-resolution procedures; and</li>
 	<li>Litigating or defending claims in federal court.</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Trademarks</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/trademark-law/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 17:29:13 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28343</guid>

		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Trademarks can be words, names or symbols or other subject matter used to identify and distinguish a company’s products or services from those of competitors and other businesses. Trademarks and service marks are essential to the brands and audiences that Scarinci Hollenbeck clients build.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Trademarks]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The IP attorneys in the firm secure and enforce national and international trademarks and service marks on behalf of clients.

Our attorneys clear trademarks domestically and abroad, registering those marks, maintaining them, and advising clients on their continued protection. We assist in policing trademarks and market identities and enforce against infringements and counterfeits. Our trademark litigators have protected or defended cases involving major brands, and have successfully resolved disputes through alternative dispute resolution methods. Our attorneys have litigated a substantial number of cases before the Trademark Trial &amp; Appeal Board. We also have extensive experience in litigation, including cases under the Anti-Cybersquatting Consumer Protection Act and handling.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Patents]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Securing patents requires an understanding of the invention, drafting process, and prosecution in the Patent Office. Our attorneys have the admissions, experience, and skills to secure, as well as assert and defend our clients’ patent rights in the US and throughout the world.

<a href="https://scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/patent-law">Scarinci Hollenbeck's Patent Law Practice</a>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_2_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Service Marks]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_2_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_2_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[In the firm's advisory capacity, we consult with clients on their desired marks and present options that can be secured and which will not interfere with the rights of others. In selecting strong and unique trademarks and service marks, our attorneys conduct broad research to ensure that protections are extensive and capable of evolving.

Since trademark and service mark protection can be lost through lack of use, the firm tailors its trademark and service mark services to the client's business model in the present and projected needs in the future. In some cases, this can mean customizing trademarks, portfolios, and ensuring that national and international renewal documents are appropriately filed. In either scenario, Scarinci Hollenbeck is well-equipped to secure, commercialize, and protect all appropriate IP rights.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_2_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_3_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Portfolio Management]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_3_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_3_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Trademark Prosecution is a notable aspect of the legal services we provide. In that regard, our attorneys have vast experience in obtaining and prosecuting word, design, and product configuration trademarks in the United States Patent and Trademark Office. We also aid clients in policing their trademarks and have successfully obstructed hundreds of infringers from selling counterfeit or unauthorized goods bearing our clients’ trademarks all around the world.

We handle all types of intellectual property transactions, and manage extensive trademark portfolios for domestic and international clients. As part of this service, we help clients of all sizes with acquisitions, divestitures, licensing, investments, and strategic planning. These include all manner of non-disclosure agreements, distribution agreements, joint venture agreements, manufacturing agreements, developments agreements, and endorsement agreements. Our attorneys are also experienced in preparing, structuring, and negotiating trademark, copyright, and patent license agreements, as well as technology development agreements.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_3_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_4_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[International Trademarks]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_4_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_4_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[We assist clients with international trademark and service mark protections. There are a number of considerations when developing a global IP strategy, including international treaties, conventions, and the laws of a given jurisdiction. By leveraging a highly networked group of colleagues and strategic IP tools, we provide clients with comprehensive IP protection both in the U.S. and abroad.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_4_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_5_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Domain Names]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_5_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_5_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The importance of domain names in representing brands and companies has led to an emerging intellectual property practice area specific to securing and asserting clients' intellectual property rights which intersect with domain names, copyrights, the Internet, and more. Scarinci Hollenbeck assists clients throughout the U.S., and around the world to claim, purchase, and negotiate the transfer of domain names which correspond to or are related to services, trademarks, and copyrights owned by clients.

The firm serves as a trademark clearing house for domain names and further advises clients on pursuing maximum protection at an optimal value, as it generally manages all aspects of the domain name transfer and conducts extensive research to identify owners and negotiate domain transfers.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>

							<wp:postmeta>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[We appear regularly in the <strong>federal bankruptcy courts in New Jersey, New York, and in other states.</strong> Our clients are the secured and unsecured creditors of debtors; the lessors of real or personal property; the employers, partners, or joint venturers of insolvents, and all other parties in interest who become enmeshed in bankruptcy proceedings.

Our clients include national and regional banks, other lending institutions, public entities, and both businesses and individuals. We also regularly work with out of state law firms whose clients become caught in <strong>New Jersey insolvencies.</strong>

Our Practice Chair, Joel R. Glucksman, is active in the American Bankruptcy Institute (ABI), and his expertise and reputation in the Bankruptcy Courts has led to his appointment as counsel for Chapter 11 trustees in numerous substantial bankruptcy proceedings. In addition, Mr. Glucksman has been named to the “New Jersey Super Lawyers” list continuously since 2007. The list, published by <em>Super Lawyers Magazine</em>, is an annual listing of outstanding lawyers from more than 60 practice areas who have attained a high degree of peer recognition and professional achievement.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Leasing</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/leasing/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 18:15:17 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28360</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>28360</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 14:15:17]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 18:15:17]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[leasing]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div id="cat-description-practice">

Scarinci Hollenbeck has a substantial commercial leasing practice as part of the firm’s Real Estate practice group.

</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="ten columns content-area content custom-single-post-body single-post-body-content practice-page-custom">
<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div class="tab-content">
<div id="practice-0" class="tab-pane practice-tab-content active" role="tabpanel">

Our attorneys represent <strong>commercial developers, real estate entrepreneurs, corporate institutions and commercial clients</strong> in a wide variety of real property leasing transactions. We have many years of experience in the structuring, drafting and negotiation of office, retail, multifamily, industrial and mixed use properties throughout the region. In addition, we counsel clients on ground lease transactions, subleases, farmland use agreements, pad leases and lease assignments and assumptions. We also provide guidance and insight on rights and remedies in connection with lease defaults, lease modifications and extension and termination issues.

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="four columns sidebar mobile-sh-specific-single-page">
<div class="post-side-bar-box-area">
<div class="ten columns content-area content custom-single-post-body single-post-body-content practice-page-custom">
<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div class="tab-content">
<div id="practice-1" class="tab-pane practice-tab-content active" role="tabpanel">

We understand both the “art” and “science” of successful leasing transactions. Lease terms and documentation must be clear and the terms must be understood by all parties. Poorly drafted agreements can result in costly and time consuming disputes. Our years of practice allow us to provide an individualized representation experience which<strong> focuses on client needs and delivery of a first rate product at an affordable cost.</strong>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="four columns sidebar mobile-sh-specific-single-page">
<div class="post-side-bar-box-area"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Areas of Service]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck is available to assist in every lease transaction, including:
<ul class="rep-matters-sports-practice">
 	<li>Negotiating and drafting commercial leases, subleases, operating agreements, estoppel agreements, and subordination agreements</li>
 	<li>Providing advice and assistance in exercising options to extend or decrease lease terms</li>
 	<li>Dealing with noncompliance with lease terms and lease defaults
Developing and troubleshooting your businesses’ lease forms and lease related issues</li>
 	<li>Assisting in asset recovery</li>
 	<li>Counseling on lease rejections tied to bankruptcy proceedings</li>
 	<li>Handling of lease modifications, extensions, assignments, and assumptions</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[2]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079bee5365]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

From the initial structuring of a sale transaction through the completion of the closing process, we can provide practical and cost effective advice and guidance to help you achieve your desired goals.

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The successful sale of real property in the State of New Jersey today calls for a combination of legal skills. These include seasoned negotiating expertise, as well as a thorough command of legal principles covering such diverse issues as conveyancing technicalities, use of title insurance, land use impacts, realty transfer tax questions, bulk sales concerns, and environmental compliance.

Our skilled real estate lawyers possess many decades of sophisticated expertise which they utilize on a daily basis to assist clients of all sizes in the disposition of commercial, industrial, and residential properties. We have successfully represented clients on the sale of:
<ul class="rep-matters-sports-practice">
 	<li>Shopping centers</li>
 	<li>Apartment buildings</li>
 	<li>Residential and commercial condominiums</li>
 	<li>Cooperative units</li>
 	<li>Office complexes</li>
 	<li>Industrial facilities</li>
 	<li>Brownfield sites</li>
 	<li>Warehouse properties</li>
 	<li>Farmland</li>
 	<li>Property portfolios</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
