Our International Law &amp; Trade practice group assists domestic and global clients in navigating the complex system of regulatory laws governing economic markets within the United States and abroad.

</div>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[We understand how business models leverage information and resources globally and the importance of establishing and maintaining operations in multiple locations throughout the world. Our lawyers have extensive experience in technology, banking and finance, consumer protection, employment, international law and taxation, intellectual property, health care, and litigation. In addition, our lawyers have hands-on business experience that enables them to provide strategic business consulting on all aspects of global.

The International Law &amp; Trade practice group provides sophisticated counsel on virtually all matters involving global trade policy, regulation, and litigation, including:
<ul class="rep-matters-sports-practice">
 	<li>International Business Transactions</li>
 	<li>Cyber Security and Data Privacy</li>
 	<li>International Taxation</li>
 	<li>International Trade Litigation and Remedies</li>
 	<li>Import and Export Compliance</li>
 	<li>Customs Law and Regulations</li>
 	<li>Global Intellectual Property Disputes</li>
 	<li>International Arbitration</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Corporate Compliance</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/corporate-compliance/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 19 Jul 2019 14:26:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The attorneys in the Corporate Compliance Practice Group provide clients with practical, time-sensitive advice and deliver pro-active solutions on a wide range of legal, compliance and regulatory issues.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[This group maintains relationships with regulators and assures current knowledge relating to legislative, judicial, and regulatory developments involving Federal, State, SRO and local matters.

We provide practical, time-sensitive advice and deliver pro-active solutions on wide range of legal, compliance and regulatory issues, including:
<ul>
 	<li>Anti-money laundering, Bank Secrecy Act, SARBOX, and foreign corrupt practices act.</li>
 	<li>Civil and criminal enforcement defense</li>
 	<li>Regulatory examinations, document production, investigations and defense of enforcement proceedings, including Wells submissions, and sanction negotiations</li>
 	<li>Broker-dealer and Investment Advisor compliance and regulatory matters</li>
 	<li>Review and revise existing policies/procedures to meet developing legislative and regulatory requirements; governance and risk assessments.</li>
</ul>
Lawyers in this group previously held senior level positions in federal and state regulatory authorities, law departments of major corporations and financial institutions.

We represent a wide spectrum of public and private companies and individuals in the defense of compliance/regulatory investigations and enforcement proceedings. Matters include leading internal company investigations, reviews of governance policies and procedures, and defending administrative proceedings, civil and criminal actions.

Our lawyers have extensive knowledge of U.S. Federal state and local regulations, with multijurisdictional capabilities. We utilize a “project management” approach to staffing client assignments that coordinate the expertise of different practice group members. Critical defense advice and options are offered at every stage of investigation or proceeding, including negotiation of resolutions on the best terms for our clients. We also have a record of success when matters are litigated to conclusion. Our team of lawyers are committed to the highest quality advocacy on behalf of client. We are effective in implementing corporate strategies with our clients to assure current and future legal and regulatory compliance.
<h4 class="mt-1 mb-0">Regulatory & Compliance Focus Areas Include:</h5>
<ul>
 	<li>Corporate Governance and Compliance</li>
 	<li>Cyber security, privacy and breach responsiveness</li>
 	<li>Federal/state administrative and regulatory law involving SEC, CFTC, FINRA, SRO’s, state insurance and securities bureaus/divisions.</li>
 	<li>Financial Institution Compliance and Regulation</li>
 	<li>Criminal and White-Collar Defense in grand jury matters, parallel civil and criminal proceedings and counseling on voluntary disclosures and Special Investigations</li>
 	<li>Internal Investigations for Public and Private Companies</li>
</ul>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Preference Defense</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/preference-defense/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 17:44:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28349</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>29008</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 13:44:31]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 17:44:31]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[preference-defense]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[With our Department Chair Joel Glucksman’s broad experience in the field, we seek to resolve preference defense cases on the most favorable terms, and in the most reasonable time frame.
]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[In the very strange area of law that is bankruptcy, filled with arcane language and incomprehensible legal concepts, there is nothing more troubling to business people than the matter of the preference defense. In its broad reach, preference law seeks to render as voidable any transfer made to a creditor within the last 90 days before a<strong>business or individual files bankruptcy.</strong>

While there are defenses – ‘new value after” and “ordinary course” to name the most prominent – they can be extremely technical and hard to use. We understand the upset that <strong>preferential transfer litigation causes,</strong> and we work with our clients to ensure them the best possible result.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section]]></wp:meta_key>

					<item>
		<title>Commercial Real Estate</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/commercial-real-estate/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 17:54:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28352</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>29009</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 13:54:34]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 17:54:34]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[commercial-real-estate]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:9:{i:0;s:5:"28282";i:1;s:5:"28360";i:2;s:5:"28363";i:3;s:5:"29010";i:4;s:5:"29017";i:5;s:5:"29015";i:6;s:5:"29011";i:7;s:5:"29012";i:8;s:5:"29013";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:1:{i:0;s:5:"28950";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[At Scarinci Hollenbeck, we represent many public, private, and institutional clients, assisting them in every aspect of the acquisition, development, financing, construction, and utilization of real property assets.
]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Practice]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[At Scarinci Hollenbeck, we represent many <strong>public, private, and institutional clients,</strong> assisting them in every aspect of the acquisition, development, financing, construction, and utilization of real property assets. Our <strong>Commercial Real Estate transactional group</strong> is made up of accomplished practitioners with many years of experience. Moreover, they work closely with our <strong>Environmental and Land Use attorneys, </strong>who have a proven track record in securing development rights for some of the largest office, retail, industrial, and multi-family development and redevelopment projects in the region. Rounding out the picture, our Commercial Lending group, an acknowledged leader in the industry, ably <strong>assists our clients in handling their real estate financing needs.</strong>

A sophisticated<strong> real estate asset practice</strong> entails the need for expertise in varied matters. With over twenty lawyers and paraprofessionals, our <strong>Commercial Real Estate group</strong> is committed to providing the highest degree of excellence with respect to every area of the practice at predictable and conservative rates. Our lawyers have extensive experience in such diverse areas as Mount Laurel requirements, environmental remediation, smart growth and green development, redevelopment, like-kind exchanges, commercial condominiums, construction contracts, farmland assessments, real property tax appeals, and PILOT agreements, among others, making Scarinci Hollenbeck your single source for real estate development and utilization. Whether the property in question is an office building, a retail shopping mall, a planned unit residential development, a warehouse, a hotel, or an industrial facility, and whether you require assistance in buying, leasing, financing, developing or redeveloping, we have the expertise to accomplish your goals. Check the Commercial Real Estate group’s attorney profiles for a list of representative matters.

Scarinci Hollenbeck works hard to deliver to our <strong>real estate clients a sophisticated and seasoned level of representation</strong> at a reasonable and predictable cost. The lawyers in the Commercial Real Estate Group implement this philosophy by judicious staffing, bringing to bear the appropriate level of experience for the job. Such an approach allows us to <strong>provide legal services of the highest caliber efficiently and economically. </strong>We also take a value added approach to every client, endeavoring wherever possible to leverage our experience to provide advice on how to maximize profits, minimize expenses, and increase the bottom line.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

Our attorneys have over twenty (20) years experience in the field and have handled many such projects.

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Often a person selling commercial real estate will seek to defer paying taxes on the gain by using the sale proceeds to purchase another like kind commercial property. This is called a “like kind exchange” and is made pursuant to <strong>Section 1031 of the Internal Revenue Code.</strong>

Our attorneys are experienced at performing these kinds of transactions and are expert at facilitating the process.]]></wp:meta_value>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Foreclosure</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/foreclosure/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 18:01:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28359</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>29011</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 14:01:50]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 18:01:50]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[foreclosure]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div id="cat-description-practice">

Knowing that a strong litigation position often leads to a ­settlement of the dispute, our attorneys are practiced ­negotiators and make every effort to negotiate a favorable and carefully documented workout of creditor-debtor ­disputes.

</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[When a foreclosure is contested, it can quite easily turn into court matter. In this situation, it is important to have ­representatives who possess the knowledge and ­experience within New Jersey’s foreclosure processes. Scarinci Hollenbeck provides comprehensive services to financially troubled entities, financial institutions and other organizations involved in foreclosing properties. Our ­attorneys are ­accustomed to dealing with complex and sophisticated ­business matters, and have many years of experience handling all financial issues surrounding ­foreclosures, including out of court workouts, and state and federal court litigation over creditors’ and debtors’ rights.

Our foreclosure practitioners have experience in working with various financial institutions, insurance companies, leasing and finance companies, along with other entities interested in preserving and enforcing their rights as ­creditors. They ­routinely advise creditors regarding their rights and solutions to foreclosures, as well as in other types of recovery of real and personal property, secured transactions, and other areas of commercial law.
<p class="mb-4"><strong>Entities that have been represented by Scarinci Hollenbeck</strong></p>
<ul class="custom-inner-list">
 	<li>Webster Bank, N.A</li>
 	<li>Trust Company of New Jersey</li>
 	<li>First Bank and Trust Company of Illinois</li>
 	<li>Wells Fargo Bank, N.A., through its Wells Fargo</li>
 	<li>Business Credit Operating Division Interchange Bank</li>
 	<li>Capital Crossing, a division of Lehman Brothers Bank,</li>
 	<li>FSB</li>
 	<li>Casino Reinvestment Development Authority</li>
 	<li>Private Capital Group, LLC</li>
 	<li>Copperfield Investments, LLC</li>
 	<li>Heritage Estates, LLC</li>
 	<li>Selene Finance LP</li>
 	<li>The Caneel Group</li>
</ul>
At Scarinci Hollenbeck, our assigned foreclosure lawyers have the ability to litigate complex, contested foreclosures. This is because the firm acts as a collective team, and often ­collaborates with related practice groups when those ­particular situations do arise. As a result, our attorneys involved with foreclosures make it priority to treat each case uniquely in order to help the firm’s clients achieve ­creative, expeditious, and cost-effective solutions.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

<div id="cat-description-practice">

We have many decades of experience in providing legal representation to mortgage lenders throughout the region.

</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The firm provides counsel to borrowers and to various national and international financial institutions, regional and local banks, and non-bank corporate and industrial loan providers in the structuring, negotiation, documentation, and closing of real property secured loan facilities, including:
<ul class="rep-matters-sports-practice">
 	<li>construction financing</li>
 	<li>term, permanent, and mini-perm loans</li>
 	<li>loan participations</li>
 	<li>subordinated financing</li>
 	<li>leasehold mortgages</li>
 	<li>loan restructuring and workouts</li>
 	<li>modification and extension transactions</li>
 	<li>land development loans</li>
</ul>
The firm also provides our borrowers and mortgage lending clients with advice and counsel with respect to troubled loans, the analysis of land use questions impacting loans, environmental issues arising in lending transactions, and title questions. We pay close attention to borrowers' documents. Our litigators offer practical guidance on the assertion of remedies, including receiverships, foreclosure, and deeds in lieu. We are also experienced in the representation of lenders faced with litigation claims arising from lending transactions.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Purchase</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/purchase/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 18:22:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28362</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>29013</wp:post_id>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div id="cat-description-practice">

Whether you are seeking to acquire a new home for your business, desire to develop a piece of real property, are looking to expand your business footprint, or need skilled guidance through the negotiation and closing of a property acquisition, we can provide the level of expertise needed for a successful result.

</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="ten columns content-area content custom-single-post-body single-post-body-content practice-page-custom">
<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div class="tab-content">
<div id="practice-0" class="tab-pane practice-tab-content active" role="tabpanel">

From the beginning of a transaction through its completion, the skilled lawyers comprising our business transactions, real estate, environmental, land use, and tax practices work together to the extent necessary in each matter to deliver practical and cost effective interdisciplinary advice to achieve each client’s specific goals.

</div>
<h3><strong>Areas of Service</strong></h3>
<ul class="rep-matters-sports-practice">
 	<li>Analysis of and advice with respect to transaction structuring and deal terms.</li>
 	<li>Negotiation of purchase agreements.</li>
 	<li>Resolution of all title questions.</li>
 	<li>Preparation of documentation required in connection with property transfers.</li>
 	<li>Assistance in preparation of land use development applications.</li>
 	<li>Structuring of 1031-like kind exchanges.</li>
 	<li>Drafting of all required corporate, partnership, or limited liability company resolutions and approvals.</li>
 	<li>Advice with respect to resolution of environmental concerns.</li>
 	<li>Attendance at closing and satisfaction of all closing and post closing requirements.</li>
 	<li>Preparation of operating agreements and equity joint ventures.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Insurance Recovery &amp; Liability</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/insurance-recovery-liability/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 18:28:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28364</guid>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div id="cat-description-practice">

Scarinci Hollenbeck’s insurance recovery and liability attorneys work with policyholders and their captive insurance companies, national and regional insurance carriers, reinsurers, brokers, and agents. We have both the technical knowledge and first-hand experience to handle virtually every matter, ranging from the routine to the very complex.

</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck assists policyholders and their captive insurers in addressing potentially covered liabilities and coverage issues and disputes through coverage opinions, negotiation, arbitration, mediation, and -- if necessary -- litigation. Our attorneys have directly assisted policyholders and their captive insurers in recovering more than $1 billion in insurance assets.

We have extensive experience in coverage matters that encompass virtually every type of policy and insured industry. Our attorneys have pursued claims associated with a wide range of insurance policies, including General Liability, Employment Liability, Fiduciary Liability, Product Liability, Directors and Officers, Errors and Omissions, Surety and Performance Bond, Property and Casualty, Marine, and Business Auto. We counsel and assist clients who are preparing and proving claims, responding to reservations of rights and denials of coverage letters, providing information in response to carrier demands, and negotiating claims.

We have significant experience in reviewing and negotiating the wording of negotiated endorsements, assessing insurance policy assets in regard to corporate and bond transactions, and assisting clients in meeting related regulatory requirements.

We also represent policyholders in the underlying claims and litigation.

Our Technology Law Group handles insurance coverage matters on issues such as:
<ul>
 	<li>Advertising Injury</li>
 	<li>Copyright Infringement</li>
 	<li>Trademark Infringement</li>
 	<li>Patent Infringement</li>
 	<li>Trade Dress (Packaging) Infringement</li>
 	<li>Misappropriation of Trade Secrets and Confidential Information
<ul>
 	<li>Business interruption</li>
 	<li>Directors and Officers/Corporate governance</li>
 	<li>Employment</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
Through its New York and New Jersey offices, the group’s attorneys have represented national and international clients, in proceedings venued in state and federal courts, in arbitrations and in mediations.]]></wp:meta_value>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Tax Abatement</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/tax-abatement-2__trashed/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Jul 2019 18:33:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28365</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>29015</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-18 14:33:00]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2019-07-18 18:33:00]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[tax-abatement-2__trashed]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[trash]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[practices]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[50]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_child_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07981e5362]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:1:{i:0;s:5:"28950";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_section_chief]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079dee5368]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The Attorneys in Scarinci Hollenbeck’s tax abatement practice have a strong track record of finding effective solutions to assist our clients in navigating complex tax abatement programs governed by New Jersey’s Long Term Tax Exemption Law.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="ten columns content-area content custom-single-post-body single-post-body-content practice-page-custom">
<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div class="tab-content">
<div id="practice-0" class="tab-pane practice-tab-content active" role="tabpanel">

The Attorneys in Scarinci Hollenbeck’s tax abatement practice have a strong track record of finding effective solutions to assist our clients in navigating complex tax abatement programs governed by New Jersey’s Long Term Tax Exemption Law. This level of expertise is essential, since cities have complete discretion in deciding whether or not to grant a long term tax exemption or for how much and how long, and inasmuch as these decisions are often controversial, it is critical to work with a firm that understand the issues and has a record of success.

</div>
<h3><strong>Areas of Service</strong></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="four columns sidebar mobile-sh-specific-single-page">
<div class="post-side-bar-box-area">
<div class="ten columns content-area content custom-single-post-body single-post-body-content practice-page-custom">
<div class="practice-page-body-content">
<div class="tab-content">
<div id="practice-2" class="tab-pane practice-tab-content active" role="tabpanel">

We offer assistance in all phases of the abatement procedure, including evaluating available programs and hands-on guidance with all phases of the process, including creating and registering qualified entities with the Department of Community Affairs, drafting abatement applications, negotiating financial agreements and project labor agreements, and advising on compliance issues. We handle exemptions and abatements for new construction, reclassification of real property, as well as eminent domain/condemnation matters.

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Tax Abatement Laws ]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The New Jersey Long Term Tax Exemption statute permits municipalities to grant tax exemptions to limited dividend entities that undertake redevelopment projects, and low and moderate income housing projects in Urban Enterprise Zones or other areas in need of redevelopment. The technical term for an abatement tax is “Payment In Lieu Of Taxes” or “PILOT.” Obtaining a tax abatement can be essential to the financial success of a proposed development, particularly when competitors have already obtained such abatements. Moreover, the decision whether or not to grant an abatement is a legislative act by the governing body.

Abatements also have cash flow benefits, with payments graduated to provide the greatest relief up front, and cash flow predictability, with taxes set at a fixed percentage after substantial completion of the project. Additional programs provide qualified projects an exemption from sales tax on capital improvements, adding 7% directly to their bottom line of any project.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[2]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079bee5365]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[include_attorney]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:1:{i:0;s:5:"28927";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_include_attorney]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07a3de536b]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[exclude_attorney]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_exclude_attorney]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07a29e536a]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[include_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:8:{i:0;s:5:"28282";i:1;s:5:"28274";i:2;s:5:"28363";i:3;s:5:"29010";i:4;s:5:"29017";i:5;s:5:"29009";i:6;s:5:"29011";i:7;s:5:"29012";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_include_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07996e5363]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[exclude_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_exclude_practice]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc07dbea656d]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title>Employment Litigation</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/employment-litigation/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 19 Jul 2019 19:47:36 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://shlaw.staging.wpengine.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=28398</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>29016</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-07-19 15:47:36]]></wp:post_date>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck defends employers in all types of employment litigation and works with employers to meet their business needs.
]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_description]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079b4e5364]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Our Approach]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Scarinci Hollenbeck employment litigation practice is comprised of New Jersey’s top litigation attorneys with extensive state and federal trial and appellate experience in employment litigation. We are proud of our successes on behalf of corporate and individual clients. Our attorneys also appear before administrative agencies on behalf of our clients, whether relating to allegations of discrimination, wage and hour disputes or union grievances. We also work closely with employers in crafting work-place policies and employee handbooks, training employees, preparing notices for reductions in staff, conducting internal investigations and developing non-compete agreements. We understand that employment-related litigation is serious requiring close coordination with our clients in order to prepare a cost-effective and successful litigation strategy in cases that often require immediate and effective action.

Employment litigation impacts not only the current state of business affairs for a company but also the way business is conducted moving forward. There is no “cookie-cutter” approach to employment litigation. We analyze each matter with a view toward our clients’ unique situation. We have developed a holistic approach to employment litigation, where we not only strategize for the litigation at hand, but we also look to its future impact on your business and current employees and proactively plan ahead. Our clients who have contested matters against their employers develop a team approach with our attorneys with a view toward an agreed-upon endgame. Each client is different and our approach is always to ensure our clients our kept abreast of their cases and involved in all aspects of their litigation.

Scarinci Hollenbeck represents employers in all phases of employment litigation, from start to finish. We provide services to our clients regarding Federal, New Jersey and New York statutes, including: Family and Medical Leave Act, the Fair Labor Standards Act, Americans with Disabilities Act, Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification Act, National Labor Relations Act, Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, Age Discrimination in Employment Act, Occupational Safety and Health Act, New Jersey Law Against Discrimination, Conscientious Employee Protection Act, New Jersey Family Leave Act, Civil Rights, ERISA, and Wage and Hour Law. Our attorneys represent clients before New Jersey and New York State and Federal Courts, and administrative agencies. We also assist in developing policies and trainings for employees of our clients that are consistent with business needs and the letter of the law. We have performed confidential investigations on behalf of our clients.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Due to our deep experience in this field, we can safely guide you from concept to completion and extend to you the benefits of our experience in the planning and operation of a successful commercial condominium project. Our attorneys have over twenty (20) years experience in the field and have handled many such projects.

If you have a property that is difficult to sell, conversion to a condominium form of ownership may be a feasible alternative. Feel confident in discussing your project with our attorneys, knowing that they have “been there and done that.”]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title>Tax Abatement</title>
		<link>https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/practices/tax-abatements/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 21 Nov 2019 21:46:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ptumulty]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://staging.scarincihollenbeck.com/?post_type=practices&#038;p=29415</guid>

		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>29415</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2019-11-21 16:46:04]]></wp:post_date>

		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>

		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The Attorneys in Scarinci Hollenbeck’s tax abatement practice has a strong track record of finding effective solutions to assist our clients in navigating complex tax abatement programs governed by New Jersey’s Long Term Tax Exemption Law. This level of expertise is essential since cities have complete discretion in deciding whether or not to grant a long term tax exemption or for how much and how long, and inasmuch as these decisions are often controversial, it is critical to work with a firm that understands the issues and has a record of success.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_0_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[NJ Tax Abatement Laws]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The New Jersey Long Term Tax Exemption statute permits municipalities to grant tax exemptions to limited dividend entities that undertake redevelopment projects, and low and moderate-income housing projects in Urban Enterprise Zones or other areas in need of redevelopment. The technical term for an abatement tax is “Payment In Lieu Of Taxes” or “PILOT.” Obtaining a tax abatement can be essential to the financial success of a proposed development, particularly when competitors have already obtained such abatements. Moreover, the decision of whether or not to grant an abatement is a legislative act by the governing body. 

Abatements also have cash flow benefits, with payments graduated to provide the greatest relief upfront, and cash flow predictability, with taxes set at a fixed percentage after substantial completion of the project. Additional programs provide qualified projects an exemption from sales tax on capital improvements, adding 7% directly to their bottom line of any project.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_1_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079d2e5367]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_2_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[What We Offer]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_content_section_2_title]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_5cc079cde5366]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[content_section_2_content]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[We offer assistance in all phases of the abatement procedure, including evaluating available programs and hands-on guidance with all phases of the process, including creating and registering qualified entities with the Department of Community Affairs, drafting abatement applications, negotiating financial agreements and project labor agreements, and advising on compliance issues. We handle exemptions and abatements for new construction, reclassification of real property, as well as eminent domain/condemnation matters.]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
